item.title: Granite feet for PMG GB1i speakers
item.description: I still like my PMC GB1i speakers a lot. They are slim and sound great, but have one practical disadvantage in our house. Our cat is heavy enough to knock them over. The relatively narrow spiked bases don’t offer much resistance against toppling. Here’s what I did about that… (to be continued).
